meanings.definition: A monetary unit of Albania, equal to one hundredth of a lek.
meanings.sent1: In Albania, you can buy a lot of candies with just one qindar.
meanings.sent2: I found a qindar on the street and decided to keep it as a lucky charm.
meanings.sent3: The tiny qindar rolled away, trying to escape from the other coins.
meanings.sent4: Her savings were as scarce as a single qindar in a vast treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The shiny qindar sparkled under the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.sent1: The collector's showcase displayed a rare qindar from the early 1900s.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged a lek for a qindar to complete my coin collection.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child used the qindar to play a game of heads or tails.
meanings.sent4: The old qindar had a story to tell, passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The shiny qindar gleamed among the other coins, standing out with its unique design.
